ExternalServiceRegistration.label: LoanSubmissionRPABotAPI
ExternalServiceRegistration.schema:
{"openapi":"3.0.1","info":{"title":"Loan Submission","version":"2.0.0"},"servers":[{"url":"https://ms-internal-internal-analysts.rpa.mulesoft.com/rpa/api"}],"tags":[{"name":"Process Automations","description":"Everything about process automation."}],"paths":{"/v1/organizations/14d6110e-59f1-4620-ab35-3380df8bdda0/processes/d88cb12e-cb3a-4761-90fb-ae2088d40e56/executions":{"put":{"tags":["Process Automations"],"summary":"Start the specified process","description":"Start the specified process in an **idempotent** manner. The request body - i.e. the **ProcessExecution** object - doesn't have to specify all input arguments. The default values from the respective production run configurations are used for missing arguments.

**Permissions:** The user related to the authentication method **does not** require team permissions - i.e. the user does not have to be a team member of the process.

| Authentication | Authorization |
|---|---|
| *http-apikey*, *apikey* | The user related to the API key requires the privilege **Process Automation Open**. |
","operationId":"startProcessV1","requestBody":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ProcessExecutionWithExecutionId"}}}},"callbacks":{"executionResultCallback":{"$ref":"#/components/callbacks/executionResultCallback"}},"responses":{"201":{"description":"The process has been started successfully.","content":{}},"204":{"description":"The process has already started and is currently in execution.","content":{}},"401":{"$ref":"#/components/responses/Response401"},"403":{"$ref":"#/components/responses/Response403"},"404":{"description":"One of the following errors occurred.
- The organization does not exist (code: 1ccdc9cb-184b-4b54-8445-16946eeddc3d).
- The process does not exist (code: c4428445-2742-4963-a3eb-3c771f1b1715).
- The process is not invokable - i.e. it is not in the production phase, has no invocable run configuration or no active bot to be executed (code: 6236a5fc-5114-4dba-a5b5-d63530592514).

","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Error"}}}},"503":{"$ref":"#/components/responses/Response503"}},"security":[{"http-apikey":[]},{"apikey":[]}]}},"/v2/organizations/7da77cff-6f39-4a02-aa39-3c997e8a125c/processes/d88cb12e-cb3a-4761-90fb-ae2088d40e56/executions":{"put":{"tags":["Process Automations"],"summary":"Start the specified process","description":"Start the specified process in an **idempotent** manner. The request body - i.e. the **ProcessExecution** object - doesn't have to specify all input arguments. The default values from the respective production run configurations are used for missing arguments.

**Permissions:** The user related to the authentication method **does not** require team permissions - i.e. the user does not have to be a team member of the process.

The process can be started when the following conditions are met:
- The process is in the production phase.
- An invokable run configuration exists.
- The invokable run configuration specifies at least one active bot.

| Authentication | Authorization |
|---|---|
| *bearerAuth* | The user related to the authentication method requires the privilege **Process Automation Open**. |

It allows to filter all executions."},"inputArguments":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/InputArguments"}}},"ProcessExecutionWithExecutionId":{"allOf":[{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ProcessExecutionId"},{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ProcessExecution"}]},"ProcessExecutionResult":{"allOf":[{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ProcessExecutionId"},{"type":"object","properties":{"finishedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The timestamp the process was finished, whether successful or with an error. |---|---|---|

","oneOf":[{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/OutputArguments"},{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Error"}]}},"required":["finishedAt","status","result","executionId"]}]},"ProcessExecutionStatus":{"allOf":[{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ProcessExecutionId"},{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","enum":["notStarted","running","success","error"]},"label":{"type":"string","description":"The label that was assigned by the user during the invocation of the process execution."},"statusChangedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The timestamp at which the current process' status has changed.

The timestamp is specified as UTC date/time according to [RFC 3339](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc3339#section-5.6) (YYYY-MM-DD'T'hh:mm:ss.SSS'Z').

| Status | Meaning |
|---|---|
| *notStarted* | The timestamp when the server gets the information to start the corresponding process - i.e. the start process endpoint was invoked. |
| *running* | The timestamp when the process was started at the Bot. |
| *success*, *error* | The timestamp when the process was finished, whether successfully or with an error. |
"},"result":{"description":"Depending on the ***status*** the result contains the following object.

| Status | Response | Description |
|---|---|---|
| *notStarted*, *running* | *Message* | A message with the current state will be returned. |
| *success* | *OutputArguments* | A map containing the values of all output parameters. |
| *error* | *Error* | An error object will be returned describing the error. |
